exm.pyn: dòng mài zhōu yàng yìng huà

exm.mng: Laba congee, ceremonial rice porridge dish eaten on the 8th day of the 12th month in the Chinese calendar

exm.pyn: xuè guǎn zhōu yàng yìng huà

exm.mng: see 僧多粥少[seng1 duo1 zhou1 shao3]
an ethnic group in ancient northern China
to talk endlessly on the phone
rice congee made with red beans, lotus seeds, longan, red dates, nuts etc
lit. many monks and not much gruel (idiom), fig. not enough to go around, demand exceeds supply

exm.cur: 一颗老鼠屎坏了一锅粥
exm.trd: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥
exm.mng: see 一粒老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥|一粒老鼠屎坏了一锅粥[yi1 li4 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 zhou1]
exm.pyn: yī kē lǎo shǔ shǐ huài le yī guō zhōu

exm.mng: (lit.) a pot of porridge, (fig.) a complete mess
